A tackle that also
hurts the user.

A life-risking tackle that
also hurts the user.

It also damages the

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.shortEffect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
